initialnote: According to BELCO's Press Release, customers who have applied for and been approved to receive the Bermuda Government COVID-19 Unemployment Benefit will be able to defer their electricity bills for as long as they are receiving the Bermuda Government COVID-19 Unemployment Benefit. BELCO  is the sole supplier of electricity in Bermuda.     https://web.archive.org/web/20200607215337/https://www.belco.bm/media/belco-bill-deferment-42020.html

countryname: Note: Data from 07 Jun 2020. Individual countries may be several days older.
Source: Oxford COVID-19 Government Response Tracker. More at: github.com/OxCGRT/covid-policy-tracker or bsg.ox.ac.uk/covidtracker
